data.name: Create a Tic-Tac-Toe bot
data.description:
Create a bot that will perform the best play in every situation. You bot will play against my bot. Your bot must at least tie every game.

Your bot must implement the interface


    public interface Game.Player {
        public int[] move(String state);
    }
    
The Bot will br initialised with the symbol he will use through the game ("X" or "O").
    
String state is representing the board state. There are three lines each having three symbols ("X", "O" or "-"). Lines are separated with linebreaks "\n".
E.g:

    OOX\n-X-\nO-X
is the same as 

    OOX
    -X-
    O-X
    
You must return an array with two elemnts, first one is the line number, second one is the column number of the cell you want to play in. Indexes are zero indexed

There are 200 Test with a strong bot, that you should at least Tie.

There are 1000 games with a random bot. 500 starting as first player ( 'X') and 500 as second ('O'). You should win at least 350 as 'X' and at least 200 as 'O'.


If you fail against the Strong bot, an array with game notation wil be give.

e.g.

    Failed game as X: [X11, O22, X20, O02, X00, O12, O_WON]
    
You can decrypt it as:

You are playing as X

move 1: put X in 1 1

move 2: put O in 2 2

move 3: put X in 2 0

...
